Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/Chicago
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Milwaukee, Chicago and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Milwaukee, Chicago and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/Chicago.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Western (FP). Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Western (FP).

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute near Halsted/Chicago
ShortDescription: 65 Grand buses temp. rerouted EB: Grand, Green, Milwaukee, Ogden, and Chicago; WB: Chicago, Ogden, Milwaukee, and Halsted, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Halsted/Chicago, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Grand, Green, Milwaukee, Ogden, and Chicago.

Westbound buses will operate via Chicago, Ogden, Milwaukee, and Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Delayed at Central Park
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are standing at Central Park due to medical emergency on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are standing at Central Park due to medical emergency on the tracks. 

Shuttle buses have been requested between Polk and 54th/Cermak to provide connecting service. At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
